comments: Prof. Capino was a solid professor. For the first few weeks of class, he kept encouraging students to drop the course, and many listened. Regardless, he was a good teacher. Every Tues, there was a pop quiz on the reading (which I never did) and movie (which were pretty decent to watch). There were 2 papers, 1 exam, and 1 group media project.
Good Professor! Never boring. Was a little unclear on exam expectations. The exam questions would be a bit too open-ended. Studying for exams was a bit difficult but overall a great class.
I got a lot out of this class because the lectures were very informational and enjoyed 80% of the movies.
tags: Get ready to read|Participation matters|Beware of pop quizzes
Skip class? You won't pass.|BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES|Hilarious
name: Jose Capino
